IJMB SCHOOL FEES BREAKDOWN

ILORIN CENTRE

IJMB School Fees Goes Like This For Our Center In ILORIN:


  • IJMB Registration Form = ₦5,000.
  • IJMB School Fees(Tuition) = ₦110,000.
  • IJMB Hostel & accommodation = ₦35,000.
  • IJMB Textbooks & Admin Charges = ₦15,000.

    • Making a total of ₦165,000. Till you write your final examination by February(For Ilorin Center)

LAGOS | OTA CENTRE

IJMB School Fees Goes Like This For Our Centers In LAGOS & SANGO-OTA:


  • IJMB Registration Form = ₦5,000.
  • IJMB School Fees(Tuition) = ₦120,000.
  • IJMB Hostel & accommodation = ₦40,000.
  • IJMB Textbooks & Admin Charges = ₦20,000.

    • Making a total of ₦185,000. Till you write your final examination by February(For Lagos & Sango-Ota Center)

ABUJA CENTRE

IJMB School Fees Goes Like This For Our Centers In Abuja:


  • IJMB Registration Form = ₦5,000.
  • IJMB School Fees(Tuition) = ₦150,000.
  • IJMB Hostel & accommodation = ₦47,000.
  • IJMB Textbooks & Admin Charges = ₦25,000.

    • Making a total of ₦237,000. Till you write your final examination by February(For Abuja Center)

PORT-HACOURT CENTRE

IJMB School Fees Goes Like This For Our Centers In Port-hacourt:


  • IJMB Registration Form = ₦5,000.
  • IJMB School Fees(Tuition) = ₦120,000.
  • IJMB Hostel & accommodation = ₦40,000.
  • IJMB Textbooks & Admin Charges = ₦20,000.

    • Making a total of ₦185,000. Till you write your final examination by February(For Abuja Center)

IBADAN CENTRE

IJMB School Fees Goes Like This For Our Centers In Ibadan:


  • IJMB Registration Form = ₦5,000.
  • IJMB School Fees(Tuition) = ₦110,000.
  • IJMB Hostel & accommodation = ₦35,000.
  • IJMB Textbooks & Admin Charges = ₦15,000.

    • Making a total of ₦165,000. Till you write your final examination by February(For Ibadan Center)

AKURE CENTRE

IJMB School Fees Goes Like This For Our Center In AKURE:


  • IJMB Registration Form = ₦5,000.
  • IJMB School Fees(Tuition) = ₦100,000.
  • IJMB Hostel & accommodation = ₦30,000.
  • IJMB Textbooks & Admin Charges = ₦20,000.

    • Making a total of ₦155,750. Till you write your final examination by February(For Akure Center)

IJMB Hostel & Accommodation


The hostel fee for each student varies across our different centers, but our hostels are close to the lecturing venue at all our various centres! Scroll to IJMB HOSTELS section to see clips from our different hostels.

IJMB Textbooks & Admin Charges


For any department, the textbooks and admin charges all cost ₦20,000! We'll provide you with all the textbooks and materials(Lab-Coat, Drawing Board...e.t.c) that you'll need to prepare for and pass the IJMB final examination.

Installment Payment For IJMB


If you are the type that want to pay installment, we've got you covered! Here's the way you can pay bit by bit;..But the dates are very important, because we won't allow any default. As you already know that funds are needed for the program to run be smoothly, the lectures and the running of the administrative responsibilities need funds. Installment payment goes like this:

NB: You can only pay the IJMB fees twice(3 times at most} The minimum you can start with to be able to start lectures with other students is ₦70,000. Which covers ₦30,000 of your school fees, hostel fee, then your textbooks & admin charges. The remaining ₦95,000 can be paid two times with arrangement between your parents(Guardian) and the coordinators at our various IJMB centres in Nigeria In Conclusion; Everything you will be paying for IJMB programme is ₦168,000 according to the explanations above in Ilorin Centre, you can Call The H.O.O.Tto know about centers in Lagos, Rivers, and Abuja.

ALL PAYMENTS SHOULD BE PAY TO THE ACCOUNT DETAILS:


NB: Account Name: A CLEAR DISTINCTION EDUCATIONAL SERVICES
Account No: 0168351670
Bank: Guaranty Trust Bank (GTB)
Payment May Be Made Through Any Of This Channels: Bank Deposit(Teller), ATM, Mobile & Internet Banking Transfers.
